catering

Enjoy food freshly prepared at the location of your choice with a personalized menu designed for your needs

Seaside Catering will craft cuisines for any occasion – such as holiday events, local dinner parties, or company retreats – that will enhance your guests’ experience.

about

Seaside Catering provides private catering services within California

Mother nature is the true artist, and our job as cooks is to allow her to shine. The food we craft is an extension of ourselves. Our team of professional chefs will cater meals to facilitate the happiness manifested between family and friends.
